short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows access to edit the google hangouts user interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Hangouts UI Editor. Allows you to take full control over your google hangouts page. Allows you to remove the annoying text, disable the background and even use your own custom backgrounds.
